1511777019_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGN.body:
Thank you kopyjane.

Im optimistic about projects like Zeronet because of your post. I read something recently about how all of the mainnet is represented (those who have a voice) by the upper 5%. Your voice, even if youre in the upper 5%, doesnt sound like what I read or hear or watch on the mainnet. 

Other things in addition to your post that make me optimistic
gnu/linux
free/libre software
cryptocurrencies
privacytools.io
firefox extensions
recently being vegetarian. Hey how do you feel about fish? 

Cheers!

1512763866_1FqWuFMghrhssAGMfzihrY7y8Fw8s.body: long term it looks good. im personally concerned about CME and CBOE futures, one opens tomorrow the other dec 18th. I fear manipulation by large institutions via shorting while dumping the underlying asset (which they may have accumulated since the announcement of futures).
